headline: In Zanzibar, During the Season of Rain
abstract: A soggy week on the Tanzanian archipelago leads to a mysterious curio shop, a taste of Zanzibar pizza, conversations with locals and a bit of spice lore.
lead_paragraph: If my circumstances had not been so dire — or rather, if my circumstances had been drier — I might never have found myself at the Zanzibar Curio Shop.
